questions.title: Two Sum
questions.description: Find two numbers that sum to target
questions.detailed description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. You can return the answer in any order.
questions.author: SHRI

questions.title: Arithmetic Progression
questions.detailed description: Given an array of numbers forming an arithmetic progression, return the next term in the sequence.
questions.author: SHRI

questions.title: Palindrome Check
questions.description: Check if a string is a palindrome
questions.detailed description: Given a string, check if it reads the same backward as forward.
questions.constraints: 1 <= s.length <= 10^5, s consists of lowercase and uppercase English letters and digits
questions.author: SHRI

questions.title: Fibonacci Sequence
questions.detailed description: Given an integer n, return the N-th Fibonacci number.
questions.author: SHRI

questions.title: Reverse String
questions.detailed description: Given a string, return the string reversed.
questions.constraints: 1 <= s.length <= 10^5, s consists of printable ASCII characters
questions.author: SHRI

questions.title: Factorial Calculation
questions.detailed description: Given an integer n, return the factorial of n.
questions.author: SHRI

questions.title: Sum of Digits
questions.description: Find the sum of digits of a number
questions.detailed description: Given an integer, return the sum of its digits.
questions.author: SHRI

questions.title: Prime Number Check
questions.description: Check if a number is prime
questions.detailed description: Given an integer n, return whether it is a prime number.
questions.author: SHRI

questions.title: Merge Two Sorted Arrays
questions.detailed description: Given two sorted arrays, return a single sorted array that merges both.
questions.author: SHRI

questions.title: Anagram Check
questions.description: Check if two strings are anagrams
questions.detailed description: Given two strings, return whether they are anagrams.
questions.constraints: 1 <= s.length, t.length <= 10^5, s and t consist of lowercase English letters
questions.author: SHRI

questions.title: Anagram Check
questions.description: Check if two strings are anagrams
questions.detailed description: Given two strings, return whether they are anagrams.
questions.constraints: 1 <= s.length, t.length <= 10^5, s and t consist of lowercase English letters
questions.author: SHRI

questions.title: Anagram Check
questions.description: Check if two strings are anagrams
questions.detailed description: Given two strings, return whether they are anagrams.
questions.constraints: 1 <= s.length, t.length <= 10^5, s and t consist of lowercase English letters
